data.meta_site_name: To the other side of the world...  And back again
data.text:
OLINGUITO UNVEILED: A new mammal was revealed as the first discovered animal species of its kind in 35 years. The olinguito weighs 2 lbs. and looks like â€œa cross between a teddy bear and a house cat.â€

â€”NBC LA, August 23, 2013

A new SchnÃ¼gel has been discovered! ğŸ˜€ Wellâ€¦ Iâ€™m a little behind in my blog posts, so technically, it was discovered back in August, but I didnâ€™t get a chance to blog about it until now. ğŸ˜›

I â™¥ SchnÃ¼gels. Itâ€™s my favorite Swiss word. For those of you who arenâ€™t familiar with it, let me backtrack a bit and give you a brief history on my introduction to the origin of this word.

My friend E- first told me about it a few years back, and ever since then, Iâ€™ve been addicted. Blick am Abend (which literally translates to â€œView at nightâ€) is a free Swiss daily newspaper that is distributed throughout all the train and tram stations here every weekday evening. On the 3rd to last page from the back, there is always a photo of â€œder SchnÃ¼gel des Tagesâ€ (the Pet of the Day).

People send photos of their cute pets with a short comment, and looking at this photo has become the highlight of my day. ğŸ™‚ Generally, it is a photo of a kitty or doggie or hamster, so I figure the word SchnÃ¼gel must mean something small, cute, and furry. However, occasionally I see a bird or snake or lizard or something else as the SchnÃ¼gel. I think recently, there was even a goldfish. But my favorites are always the cute, fluffy ones.

Once, I came upon a website that showed a KÃ¤gi-fretli chocolate bar as the SchnÃ¼gel of the Day, but Iâ€™m not sure if it was a joke or not, as I canâ€™t read German. ğŸ˜¦

But usually SchnÃ¼gels are cutie animals. So it was very exciting for me to read that scientists recently discovered a new mammal. With big eyes and soft orange-brown fur, the olinguito definitely fits the definition of a SchnÃ¼gel. I mean, look at this guyâ€¦ it almost appears as if heâ€™s smiling at us!

Hip hip hooray! A new SchnÃ¼gel has been discovered. The world is now a cuter place. ğŸ™‚
